languages.text: "Мы готовы рассказать вам все, что знаем, дабы поскорее уладить это недоразумение".

traits.locale_text: "Мы готовы рассказать вам все, что знаем, дабы поскорее уладить это недоразумение".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "We are ready to tell you everything we know so that this misunderstanding can be remedied as quickly as possible."
languages.original_text: "Мы готовы рассказать вам все, что знаем, дабы поскорее уладить это недоразумение".

traits.locale_text: "We are ready to tell you everything we know so the misunderstanding can be settled as soon as possible."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "We are ready to tell you everything we know so that this misunderstanding can be remedied as quickly as possible."

languages.text: “我们愿意告诉您我们所知的一切，希望我们能尽快化解这场误会。”
languages.original_text: "We are ready to tell you everything we know so that this misunderstanding can be remedied as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: “我们愿意告诉您我们所知的一切，希望我们能尽快化解这场误会。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Estamos dispuestos a contarle todo lo que sabemos para resolver este malentendido lo antes posible».
languages.original_text: "We are ready to tell you everything we know so that this misunderstanding can be remedied as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: «Estamos dispuestos a contarle todo lo que sabemos para resolver este malentendido lo antes posible».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「この誤解をできるだけ早く解くために、我々は知っていることをすべてお話しする用意がある」
languages.original_text: "We are ready to tell you everything we know so that this misunderstanding can be remedied as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: 「この誤解をできるだけ早く解くために、我々は知っていることをすべてお話しする用意がある」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Wir sind bereit, Euch alles zu sagen, was wir wissen, damit dieses Missverständnis möglichst schnell aufgeklärt werden kann."
languages.original_text: "We are ready to tell you everything we know so that this misunderstanding can be remedied as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind bereit, Euch alles zu sagen, was wir wissen, damit dieses Missverständnis möglichst schnell aufgeklärt werden kann."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Nous sommes prêts à répondre à toutes vos questions, histoire de dissiper tout malentendu au plus vite. »
languages.original_text: "We are ready to tell you everything we know so that this misunderstanding can be remedied as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes prêts à répondre à toutes vos questions, histoire de dissiper tout malentendu au plus vite. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Bu yanlış anlamanın bir an önce giderilmesi için size bildiğimiz her şeyi anlatmaya hazırız."
languages.original_text: "We are ready to tell you everything we know so that this misunderstanding can be remedied as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yanlış anlamanın bir an önce giderilmesi için size bildiğimiz her şeyi anlatmaya hazırız."
